methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructor for a scheduled Decompile runnable

params.name: program
params.comment: the program containing the function to be decompiled

params.name: location
params.comment: the location for which to find its containing function.

params.name: debugFile
params.comment: if non-null, the file to store decompile debug information.

methods.javadoc:
Checks if the given program and location represent the same function as this
 decompile's function
methods.name: matches
methods.comment:
Checks if the given program and location represent the same function as this
 decompile's function

methods.javadoc:
Automatically called in the Swing thread by the RunManager after the run() method completes.
 If the decompile wasn't cancelled, it reports the results back to the DecompilerController.
methods.name: swingRun
methods.comment:
Automatically called in the Swing thread by the RunManager after the run() method completes.
 If the decompile wasn't cancelled, it reports the results back to the DecompilerController.

methods.javadoc: locates the function to be decompiled based on the location given at construction time.
methods.name: findFunction
methods.comment: locates the function to be decompiled based on the location given at construction time.
